interestingFact: 95 countries exist: 193 UN members and 2 observer states.
Nepal hosts Mount Everest, Earth's tallest peak at 8,848.86 meters.
Millions visit Egypt's Great Sphinx and Pyramids of Giza annually.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Brazil is the largest Portuguese-speaking country in the world.
France is the world's most visited country by tourists.
Russia spans 11 time zones, the most of any country in the world.
The USA has the world's largest economy by nominal GDP.
India surpassed China to become the most populous country in 2023.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
